answers.answer: When I had something similar, may more, I was diagnosed with Type II Diabetes.  My blood glucose was over 33 (600 ml/dl) and I was miserable.  I started insulin and glucotrol treatment and got things under control.  My normal evening output is around 500 ml per 7 hours sleep.You would probably need to consult your Primary Care Physician to make sure you're not diabetic.Good luck.Millard

question: what does 1750 urine output in a 24 hour mean
title: pt is hypertensive and diabetic
